title: How to Look for People on Facebook Mobile or Desktop

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. Tap the Facebook app icon, which resembles a white "f" on a dark-blue background. This will open the News Feed if you're logged into Facebook. If you aren't logged in, enter the email address and password that you use to log into Facebook.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's either in the bottom-right corner of the screen (iPhone) or at the top of the screen (Android). A menu will appear.

steps.title: Tap Friends.
steps.content: Tap Friends . You'll see this on the right side of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Suggestions.
steps.content: Tap Suggestions . This tab is in the upper-left corner of the screen. Doing so will bring up a list of suggested friends. If you don't see this option, you may see it at the bottom of the page, under the People you may know header.

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. You can tap Add Friend to the right of a person's profile to add them to your friends list, or you can tap a person's profile to view more information about them if their security settings allow for it. If you can't find your friend, see our FAQ section to troubleshoot.

steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's either in the bottom-right corner of the screen (iPhone) or at the top of the screen (Android). A menu will appear.

steps.title: Tap Friends.
steps.content: Tap Friends . This option is in the menu.

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. You can scroll through a list of your current friends here, or you can type a friend's name into the search bar at the top of the page.

steps.title: Open Facebook in your browser.
steps.content: Open Facebook in your browser. This will open your News Feed if you're logged into Facebook. If you aren't logged in, enter in the upper-right side of the page the email address and password that you use to log into Facebook. You can use Facebook's "Suggestions" feature to find people you may know.

steps.title: Click the "Friends" icon.
steps.content: Click the "Friends" icon. It's a silhouette of two people at the top of the Facebook page. A drop-down menu will appear.

steps.title: Click Suggestions.
steps.content: Click Suggestions . You can find this in the left toolbar, underneath Friend requests .

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. You can click Add Friend to the right of a person whom you know, or you can click a person's profile to view more information about them if their security settings allow for it. If you can't find your friend, see our FAQ section to troubleshoot.

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Go to [1] X Research source in your browser. This will open your News Feed if you're logged into Facebook. If you aren't logged in, enter in the upper-right side of the page the email address and password that you use to log into Facebook.

steps.title: Click your name.
steps.content: Click your name. It's in the upper-right side of the page. Doing so will open your profile page.

steps.title: Click the Friends tab.
steps.content: Click the Friends tab. You'll find this option below your profile picture. A list of your friends will open.

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. You can scroll through the friends listed on this page, or you can type a specific friend's name into the search box to the right of the Friends heading.

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. Go to the [+ https://www.facebook.com/+ Facebook website] (desktop) or tap the Facebook app icon (mobile). This will open your News Feed if you're logged in. If you aren't logged in, enter the email address and password that you use to log into Facebook before continuing.

steps.title: Select the search bar.
steps.content: Select the search bar. It's the text box at the top of the Facebook page.

steps.title: Type in a friend's name.
steps.content: Type in a friend's name. Enter the name of the person whom you want to find on Facebook.

steps.title: Select the friend's name.
steps.content: Select the friend's name. In the drop-down box that appears below the search bar, click or tap the name that matches the one that you typed in.

steps.title: Select the People tab.
steps.content: Select the People tab. It's either at the top of the page (desktop) or in the upper-left corner of the screen (mobile).

steps.title: Review the results.
steps.content: Review the results. You'll see a list of profiles that match the name that you entered; look for your friend here. If you find your friend, you can select their profile picture to view their profile or add them as a friend. You can narrow the results by selecting a filter on the left side of the page (desktop). On mobile, you'll do this by tapping Filters in the upper-left side of the screen and then selecting a filter (e.g., location).

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. This feature can only be enabled using the mobile app. If you aren't already logged into your account, do so now. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This will be at the top-right (Android) or bottom-right (iOS).

steps.title: Tap Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings & privacy . You can find this in the menu.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Accounts Center.
steps.content: Tap Accounts Center . This is the tile at the top.

steps.title: Tap Your information and permissions.
steps.content: Tap Your information and permissions . You can find this under the Account settings header.

steps.title: Tap Upload contacts and select your account.
steps.content: Tap Upload contacts and select your account. If you have multiple Facebook accounts linked, you'll see them here.

steps.title: Toggle off "Upload contacts".
steps.content: Toggle off "Upload contacts". The switch will turn green.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions. You may need to provide permission to your contacts list. Select Continue or Get Started to proceed. Once your contacts have been synced to Facebook, you should see more friend recommendations.

steps.title: I can't send a friend request.
steps.content: I can't send a friend request. If you can't send someone a friend request on Facebook, you may have already sent a friend request. On the other hand, they may have hit the limit of 5,000 Facebook friends. In this case, they'll need to unfriend someone else before they can add you. The other person may also have disabled friend requests. You'll have to ask them to add you, if this is the case.

steps.title: How do I check pending friend requests?
steps.content: How do I check pending friend requests? To check if the friend requests you've sent are pending, visit the Request page .

steps.title: How do I change who can add me?
steps.content: How do I change who can add me? To change who can add you on Facebook, you'll need to go into your privacy settings and change your preferences. Do the following: Navigate to Settings & privacy . Select Settings . Select Audience and visibility . Select How people find and contact you . Select Edit next to Who can send you friend requests? Select the drop-down menu and select Everyone or Friends of Friends . [3] X Research source
